Content.Text:
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was just reading a book on the guild.
<PAGE>
Not that the Guild Master is a hereditary position
or anything, but it's still good to know the
material.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My mother, and the town as a whole, will
eventually decide whether I inherit the guild or
not.
<PAGE>
And, to be honest, right now I have no intention
of quitting my job as a nurse.
<PAGE>
Whatever I do, I want to help my mother.
<PAGE>
When she retires, of course I will want to take
over her job as Guild Master.
<PAGE>
But first, I'll need to be worthy of the post.
Which is why I'm doing everything I can to learn
about it.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? N-no...it's not that amazing, really...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Think I'd make a good enough Guild Master?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, aren't we confident? But what are you
basing that on?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I give you the impression that I'm kind and
responsible?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see.
<PAGE>
I thought Lillie was the only one who saw me
that way.
<PAGE>
But you and the other townsfolk, you...agree
with her? That's encouraging, to say the least.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_LAUGH>Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, if you don't mind, I do have some
more reading I need to finish.
<PAGE>
Could I ask you to come back at a later time,
please?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're hesitating. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You must not think I'm ready yet.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, no. I'm well aware of how far short I fall
when compared to my mother's
accomplishments as Guild Master.
<PAGE>
It's only natural that others would see the same
thing, I suppose. Thank you for the valuable
input.
<PAGE>
Now then, if you don't mind, I have a book to
finish.
<PAGE>
Could I ask you to come back at a later time,
please?
